title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A1, the response must correctly describe a type of party system.

For Task A2, the response must correctly explain how that type of party system influences policy making.

For Task B1, the response must correctly describe a second type of party system.

For Task B2, the response must correctly explain how that second type of party system influences policy making.

For Task C, the response must correctly explain how a party system is influenced by the type of electoral system.

For Task D, the response must correctly explain how regime change can lead to a change in the type of party system.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the six tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes five of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes six of the tasks set by the question.
